name: mystique
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a quality of being special in a mysterious and attractive way: There's great mystique attached to/surrounding the life of a movie star. Too much publicity has destroyed the mystique of the British monarchy.

Add to word list
a quality of mysterious attraction: The specialty shop creates a mystique for tea like the one surrounding coffee.
